channel.title: Homes on Meixin Zhu
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Meixin Zhu

item.description: Biography I am a phd student in intelligent transportation at the University of Washington. I also serve as a research assistant in Smart Transportation Applications and Research Laboratory (STAR Lab) at the University of Washington, advised by Prof. Yinhai Wang. Before joining STAR Lab, I served as a research assistant in Tongji’s Traffic Safety Research Group, advised by Prof. Xuesong Wang from 2014 to 2018. I worked as a research intern at the Oak Ridge National Laboratory under the supervision of Prof.

item.title: Publications
item.description: For a most recent publication list, please refer to my CV.

item.title: Research
item.description: Table of Contents Driving Behavior Normal Driving Behavior Car-Following Behavior Lane-Change Behavior Cut-In Behavior Collision Avoidance Behavior Distracted Driving Vehicle Active Safety Developing Forward Collision Warning System Evaluating Forward Collision Warning System Optimized Road Design Traffic Flow Modeling and Simulation Car-Following Model Traffic Simulation Based on Cellular Automata Autonomous Driving Autonomous Car-Following Human-Like Car Following Safe, Efficient, and Comfortable Car Following Autonomous Driving in Mixed Traffic Environments Driving Behavior Normal Driving Behavior Shanghai Naturalistic Driving Study collected 60 Chinese drivers’ daily driving data, with a total mileage of 161,055 km.

item.title: Awards
item.description: Slected Awards and Scholarships National Graduate Scholarship (twice), Ministry of Education, China. Oct 2017, Oct 2016 Outstanding Student Award, Tongji University. Oct 2016 China Post-Graduate Mathematical Contest in Modeling, Second Prize. Sep 2016 “Inspirational Star”, Tongji University. Jun 2015 Volvo Group Scholarship, Volvo Group. Dec 2014 Excellent Student Scholarship, Tongji University. Nov 2014 National Competition of Transport Science and Technology for Students, Second Prize. May 2014 Mathematical Contest in Modeling, Honorable Mention.
